channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Health officials slash the number of vaccines recommended for all kids
item.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is reducing the number of vaccines recommended for all children. The action follows a presidential memo...

item.title: US sharply criticised by foes and friends over Maduro seizure
item.description: The US taking of Venezuela's leader has faced strong criticism from both America's friends and foes.

item.title: Thirty-two Cubans killed during US attack on Venezuela
item.description: Cuba's president said military and intelligence operatives were providing protection to captured leader Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Watch: What it was like in the courtroom at Maduro's hearing
item.description: The BBC's Madeline Halpert was inside the room as the former Venezuelan president addressed the judge.

item.title: Trump's seizure of Maduro raises thorny legal questions, in US and abroad

item.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
item.description: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

item.title: Jury selection begins in trial for ex-officer accused in police response to Uvalde school shooting
Their homes survived the historic LA area wildfires, but a year later they fear living in them
